means: （对罗马教皇的尊称）陛下，圣座

sentence.Network_en: The President received His Holiness at the White House.
sentence.Network_cn: 总统在白宫接见了教皇陛下。

sentence.Network_en: The holiness of God reveals one's own sin.
sentence.Network_cn: 上帝的神圣揭示世人自身的罪孽。

sentence.Network_en: We were immediately struck by this city's holiness.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们立即就被这座城市的神圣氛围所打动。

Nahum begins his prophecy by discussing the holiness , omnipotence , and righteousness of God ., 那鸿书一开始就在讨论上帝的圣洁 , 全能和公义.

holy的翻译中文意思-在线英汉词典 ... holy day 宗教节日 holy water 圣水; 净水 holy orders 圣职; 牧师的职位.

entry.def: Holiness is the state or quality of being holy.

example.ex: The holiness of God reveals one's own sin...
example.tran: 上帝的神圣揭示世人自身的罪孽。

example.ex: We were immediately struck by this city's holiness.
example.tran: 我们立即就被这座城市的神圣氛围所打动。

entry.tran: （对天主教教皇或某些其他宗教领袖的尊称）陛下，圣座
entry.def: You say Your Holiness or His Holiness when you address or refer respectfully to the Pope or to leaders of some other religions.

example.ex: The President received His Holiness at the White House.
example.tran: 总统在白宫接见了教皇陛下。

auth_sentence.content: He said, His Holiness would have the final word.
auth_sentence.res_content: He said, His Holiness would have the final word.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He said, His Holiness would have the final word.

auth_sentence.content: To talk of holiness and to practise injustice is mere hypocrisy.
auth_sentence.res_content: To talk of holiness and to practise injustice is mere hypocrisy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: To talk of holiness and to practise injustice is mere hypocrisy.

auth_sentence.content: His Holiness said, I don't know what is happening in Iran.
auth_sentence.res_content: His Holiness said, I don't know what is happening in Iran.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His Holiness said, I don't know what is happening in Iran.

sentences.en: They worship dreams Holiness in art, ritual, entertainment.
sentences.cn: 他们崇拜梦，崇拜艺术、仪式和娱乐中的神圣。

sentences.en: He prayed to God night and day to endue him with the spirit of holiness.
sentences.cn: 他日夜祈求上帝赋予他虔敬的心。
